title: Hand Gesture Recognition with Python
description: In this article, I will take you through a very simple Machine Learning project on Hand Gesture Recognition with Python programming language. Hand gesture recognition system received great attention in the recent few years because of its manifoldness applications and the ability to interact with machine efficiently through human-computer interaction.
